response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the oven. The next step is to open the oven.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the pie out of the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the oven.
(6) Open the oven.
(7) Put the pie in the oven.
(8) Close the oven.
(9) Turn on the oven to heat the pie.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):

    donothing(env)
